elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve

Class SieveDecoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.SieveDecoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    elkfed.coref.CorefResolver

    public class SieveDecoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements elkfed.coref.CorefResolver
    Implements the decodeDocument method which walks through the document and runs the appropriate sieve for every mention.

    sebastianruder
